member.name: STORAGE_PORT_CODE_SET.StoragePortCodeSetReserved
member.summary: Indicates an unknown storage adapter driver type.

member.name: STORAGE_PORT_CODE_SET.StoragePortCodeSetStorport
member.summary: Storage adapter driver is a Storport-miniport driver.

member.name: STORAGE_PORT_CODE_SET.StoragePortCodeSetSCSIport
member.summary: Storage adapter driver is a SCSI Port-miniport driver.

member.name: STORAGE_PORT_CODE_SET.StoragePortCodeSetSpaceport
member.summary: Storage adapter driver is the Spaceport driver.

member.name: STORAGE_PORT_CODE_SET.StoragePortCodeSetATAport
member.summary: Storage adapter driver is an ATA-port miniport driver.

member.name: STORAGE_PORT_CODE_SET.StoragePortCodeSetUSBport
member.summary: Storage adapter driver is the USB-storage port driver.

member.name: STORAGE_PORT_CODE_SET.StoragePortCodeSetSBP2port
member.summary: Storage adapter driver is the SBP2 port driver.

member.name: STORAGE_PORT_CODE_SET.StoragePortCodeSetSDport
member.summary: Storage adapter driver is an SD-port miniport driver.
